title: Temple with great view..
review: Jai Santoshi Maa

title: A Small, Clean and Peaceful Temple on mountain near Tip N Top
review: It is a small, clean and peaceful Temple situated on mountain near Tip N Top. It is accessible from road after few step climb. Very peaceful area with good view of valley.

title: Nice Small Temple.. with lots of positivity
review: We walked down to this Temple from GMVN resort, it was hardly 10 minuets walk. A quite and clean road and foggy weather made this trip so great , around 50 steep stares are there so avoid going with elders who have difficulties in climbing up.

title: Can visit it for sunset view
review: It takes around 10-15 minute of stair climbing to reach Santoshi Mata Temple on top of the hill. Not much difficult to reach .

title: Small temple where you feel blessed
review: You have to climb quite a few stairs to reach the temple of Ma Santoshi and get blessed . You will come out with a relaxed way . At the top of hill the view can also be enjoyable .

title: Tiny Room... no Priest... seemed deserted for a long time... Nice walk up the stairs though :)
review: Tiny Room... no Priest... seemed deserted for a long time... Nice walk up the stairs though :) But this was true for most of the landsdowne "Places to See" ... mostly deserted or very few people... Just a lot of sweepers around keeping the place clean :) :)

title: Small temple, positivity, great views, calm and sunset
review: It is around a km walk from Tip in Top point, there are a few stairs that one must climd to reach the top.

title: Simple and serene
review: Quiet and a good trek up hill. Sitting there provides you peace of mind and heart. Its a simple shrine of Maa Durga

title: Peace and quiet for a silent prayer on top of a hill
review: No long queues of devotees, no shouting from the stalls, no pandas, no monkeys ... just a small temple on top of a hill.

title: Jai Santoshi Maa
review: You need to park your vehicle and walk up around a hundred steps.

title: Average Temple
review: This is a small temple set atop the hill. Bit of a climb. May Not be worth it if you are going with the elderly.

title: Great Sunset View alongwith the Skyline view
review: This places affords the best sunset view in Lansdowne. The temple is peaceful and maintained by the army personal.

title: Temple
review: this is very quite place and beautiful. you feel like your are out of the world. and feel relax inside the temple.

title: Don't forget to take blessings of Santoshi Mata!
review: Just little bit ahead of Tip-in-Top is this temple of Santoshi Mata. A sign board is there near to St. Mary's Church which shows all the nearby place along with distance and direction, so very easy to find and reach there. Very peaceful place again.

title: Good Sunset View Point
review: Having limited time in hand, we headed to this spot after Tip-N-Top, for Sun Set...

title: At the very Top ! Jai Maa
review: Brilliantly situated at the top of the hill with magnificent views of the valley and a great Sunset spotting spot ! Wow place !

title: Temple with good views too.
review: I trekked to this temple from bhulla tal and enjoyed my walk. It's a quite a beautiful temple and as it's situated at some height provides good vies of the mountains and is also a sunset point, if possible time your visit accordingly to enjoy a great sunset view.

title: Mata Santoshi Temple - holy and peaceful
review: After climbing a flight of steep steps you can reach Santoshi Mata Temple on top of the hill. Offer prayers to Ma and spend some time sitting inside the quiet temple. You may also wish to meditate in this serene and quaint location inside the temple which is at the top of the hill. The sunset view at the far away mountains will refresh your soul and body.

title: Jai Santoshi Maa
review: Santoshi maa temple is located near Tip-n-Top. It is a small temple, you have to climb some steps to reach the temple. You will feel same peace and divine vibes as you will feel in most of the temples.

title: Santoshi Mata Mandir
review: A small Quite Santoshi Mata Mandir at a hill top. took around 10 min to climb from our drop point. It has a great valley view from behind the mandir.

title: walk
review: this place is peaceful and nice.

title: gr8 view
review: the temple per se is nice but my reason to visit was to get a clear view of trishul ranges which can be seen on a clear day

title: Mata Temple situated at height
review: All I can say that it is situated at some height and you need to walk at least 10 mins on stairs to reach there..

title: Beautiful and serene
review: Situated just before the sunset point, this is one of must visits, a small flight of stairs will take you right on top of the small hill top,,, the path has been beautifully decorated with bells and was very clean.......Once on top, you will realize why God's descend on such places....

title: Good
review: Good place to visit.Well maintained by Army personal .Gives nice around views.

title: Mountain top temple
review: As usual and like all hill stations, here in Lansdowne too there is a mountain top temple. There were quite a few steps up to the temple but my 72 year old mother managed quite well and I felt very happy and proud for that. It is quite scenic and peaceful once you are up there.

title: Dev Bhumi Devi Darshan
review: while in Landsdowne  which is part of Dev Bhoomi Uttranchal there will be Local temples worth visiting if you believe in God. its nice little clean temple one has to reach after climbing ~200 steps

title: Visit in Jan 2017
review: Well versed with nature in Cantt area. Tall trees in the surroundings add to the Mandir ambience. A quite place to meditate in sync with nature. Neat place.

title: Must visit!
review: Amazing... when I was there, a Sikh soldier from one of the regiment was doing pooja.  He told us that the temple is managed and maintained by the Garwal Rifles Regiment.  Sunset from temples door is an amazing site.

title: A moment of peace and solitude
review: A small but beautiful temple to visit and pay obeisance....a nice place to spend a quiet moment with your loved ones and seek divine blessings.

title: A beautiful temple to visit
review: This is a nicely maintained temple but you need to climb to some extent and it can be a daunting task for some. The view from the top is very good and the temple is also considered a sunset view point

title: Worth
review: Worth the track to the location to offer prayers. This comes after tip-n-toe. Managed by the Army itself, recommend all.

title: A good trek after a heavy lunch
review: Quick Facts & Tips:

title: Great sunset
review: It's half a kms from tip n top. Great place to see sunset.the temple is maintained by the army. Yet another place to view sunset is Kendriya Vidyalaya ground, about a km ahead if the temple.

title: isolated place
review: No one was there when we went there.Again this a peaceful place. But you have to climb some tough stairs to reach this place.

title: Divine experience
review: It's a steep climb via ~50 stair steps to Santoshi Mata temple. Even the drive to reach this place is steep, hence, enjoyable. Nature was at it's best and divine.

title: Jai Santoshi Mata
review: I just visited this place as it was listed on this website :P But after reaching there I got a little convinced as to why. This place has a magnetic aura and you feel at peace here. It is almost as someone is protecting you in this place. A very good feeling.

title: Good and small temple
review: Good temple to visit, just approx. 500 meters away from Tip and Top. The temple is at a height and thus have to climb few stairs. temple is small and average view from the top.

title: Jai Maa Santoshi
review: We traveled 280km from Delhi, and some how this small temple got peace we miss in our daily life.

title: Sun rise and sun set from one point
review: Its a temple at top of  Jaiharikhal village, its a perfect place for sun rise and sun set views. its near to tip in top

title: Good experience
review: The place is very peaceful and divine.

title: Holy place.
review: This temple is situated after tip n top point when coming from lansdowne. Mata mandir is situated above the cliff and car is parked aprox 200 mtrs from temple.

title: Peaceful place
review: It is a very peaceful place and not to be missed. It is around 1 km from Tip and Top point but the travel is worth.

title: Peaceful and serene temple.
review: a peaceful and serene place, you will have to walk about 100 steps to reach this temple. The temple is small and being at the top of hill, is very peaceful and quite. You won't get any eatables around and won't have much activity to spend time here. Though just sit, relax and feel it overall.

title: Good trek to temple
review: The place is very peacefull & worth visit while in Lansdowne.

title: Peaceful & Serene
review: A peaceful place to get lost in. A spiritually strong place that you would not like to give it a miss and is not too far from Bhulla Tal Lake. Do not rush when you visit this temple. Spend some good 1-2 hours, sitting in this serenity and figure out your life :D

title: Peaceful
review: Just do a little extra effort to get onto that place, since you would be a little tired of walking till Tip in Top. It's about 10 minutes away from Tip in Top. Nothing fancy about the temple, but was rather peaceful. View from that temple is amazing. It's very quiet there but you won't feel insecure! I liked that place, was just to sit and relax :)

title: Temple in midst of Peaceful Nature
review: I believe the only struggle is to reach here, else rest is just beautiful and peace right at the top and middle of nature.

title: Another beautifully located temple in Lansdowne..Santoshi Mata
review: the trek to Santoshi Mata is quite strenuous..a lot of stairs, apart from the winding route..the weather was fantastic when we went there..mist all around ,and at some places we couldn't see 10 meters in front of us..

title: Forget tip n top
review: This is the best sunset point in Lansdowne. Tip n top is commercialized and that is why people know of it, but the kind of view you get from Santoshi Mata temple is mesmerizing. Plus the arti that takes place there is very simplistic n reeks of modesty in many many ways

title: Calm and Quiet. Hill Top Temple
review: Even though its a very small temple, its situated right on top of a hill. Apart from being very serene and quiet, it offers a great view of places around it.

title: Temple a must see at Lansdowne
review: The temple is reached through a winding and slightly steep approach. About a km away from Tip and Point .The temple is well located at one of the highest's spot of the town.The views from here of the peaks are magnificent

title: While on the way to sunset point
review: Just that it is located on a walking distance from Tip n Top GMVN guest house and on the way to sunset point, one could climb a numerous stairs to reach the temple. As such, maintained by army, there is less maintenance with loud music playing and that too of some pop-fusion bhajan! Yet, the location offers some nice view of the setting sun. Still better, go 100 meters ahead and enjoy the setting of the sun to the last detail at the sunset point. No loss if missed this spot!

title: Santosi Mata Temple
review: Its a very small temple amidst greenary.Beautiful hills and villages around.I didn't know about this temple at all. Came across this temple while trekking. It was evening by the time we reached at this temple and was closed but I had taken photos of the temple and around it. I was mesmerised by the beauty of this place.

title: Get Inner Peace
review: This temple is managed by the cantonment army. In the evening bhajans, give you inner peace and the it's rather a small trek which is worth taking.

title: Every one should visit
review: Every one should visit. Santoshi maa temple. near to church.

title: It has positivity
review: this place is a usual small temple but the vibes there can connect u to the gods .. Like at such an altitude  n peace in d surroundings .. Its make u feel  life is better slower paced  n blessed too

title: Near Set Point
review: You have ride atlest 30-40 steps. On the top of the hills and very near to Sunset Point. Have a one of the best scenic view after Tip-in Top

title: Beautiful. Jai Mata Di!
review: The exhaustion from the flight of stairs to the temple seems to disappear as soon as you enter the temple have mata's darshan.

title: A place from where the sunset view is must
review: Visit this place in the evening with your camera with zoom lens and tripod to capture the sunset view after the darshan of the Santoshi mata. The kind of sunset you will not get at any of the hill station.

title: Calm and Simple Temple, Great Views
review: The temple is located close to the tip and top point. You have to climb a flight of steep but manageable stairs to get there. As a temple, its a very small one. Its usually not crowded and hence very peaceful. What is mesmerizing about this place is the view that it offers - as good as tip n top. And since it is much less crowded than tip n top, you can spend more time there comfortably.

title: Small temple with Jai mata di labelled on each step
review: A small temple after you climb approx 100 steps, difficult to climb for people with knee problem.  I will not advise to visit the place as it is tough to reach top of it.

title: Santoshi Mata Mandir at Lansdowne.
review: The Santoshi Mata Mandir at Lansdowne is on the road ahead of the Tip in Top point and towards the road to the Central School. After passing beyond the Tip in Top point we have to proceed ahead on the road for around one kilometer when a signboard for the Santoshi Mata Mandir can be seen on the right side . Park your vehicle by the roadside, where plenty of space is available, and a steep climb on the right side takes you to the temple on foot. The temple is at a spot higher than the Tip in Top point, however the views are not that good. The temple has a boundary wall all-around and is gated. It is a small temple maintained by the Garwhal Rifles people and is quite clean . No shop exists for selling Prasad etc. No pandit can be found inside. If we visit the Tip in Top point than we must not give this temple a miss.

title: Calm & quite holy place.
review: Somehow I found this temple very calm & quite place. You have to go to the uphill to see this temple. Good & nice temple to see & pray.  " Jai Mata Ki ".

title: Worth Visiting
review: You may need to step few ladders to reach the temple but once you reach there it is worth going there.
